黑客通过新闻、媒体托管网站推送 USB 恶意软件有效负载https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hackers-push-usb-malware-payloads-via-news-media-hosting-sites/ Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:31:43 -0500比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hackers-push-usb-malware-payloads-via-news-media-hosting-sites/ A financially motivated threat actor using USB devices for initial infection has been found abusing legitimate online platforms, including GitHub, Vimeo, and Ars Technica, to host encoded payloads embedded in seemingly benign content. Europcar否认5000万用户数据泄露，称数据是假的https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/europcar-denies-data-breach-of-50-million-users-says-data-is-fake/ Wed, 31 Jan 2024 14:25:10 -0500劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/europcar-denies-data-breach-of-50-million-users-says-data-is-fake/ Car rental company Europcar says it has not suffered a data breach and that shared customer data is fake after a threat actor claimed to be selling the personal info of 50 million customers. 针对影响 7 个 OEM 的 Android 本地海拔漏洞的漏洞发布https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/exploit-released-for-android-local-elevation-flaw-impacting-7-oems/ Wed, 31 Jan 2024 14:15:23 -0500比尔·图拉斯SecurityGoogleMobile https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/exploit-released-for-android-local-elevation-flaw-impacting-7-oems/ A proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for a local privilege elevation flaw impacting at least seven Android original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) is now publicly available on GitHub. However, as the exploit requires local access, its release will mostly be helpful to researchers. [...]
